titles.title: It's Jesus I really want to see

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have truly known the good life filled with family and friends
I have been blessed with more than my shares
Yet with all of my good fortune
My heart is seeking still
No, I just can't t deny the longing there

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus
It's Jesus I really want to see
The more I see of this world, the less it means to me
For it's Jesus I really want to see

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have been a lot of places
And I have known the great and small
I have seen the grand and noble works of me
But in all of all my heart
I know there's much for me
So much more than this faded world at hand

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Chorus2
It's Jesus I really want to see
The more I see of this world, the less it means to me
For it's Jesus I really want to see
